creator: ubuntu@rossfamily.co.uk
text:
Reported against Ubuntu package in Launchpad (https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/batik/+bug/256828). Original text as follows:

As specified at [1], it should be possible to use javax.imageio.* apis for JPEG encoding. We need to evaluate if this is practical, without any loss of functionality and then patch batik source. This will make batik usable with more Free JVMs.

[1] http://developer.classpath.org/mediation/ClasspathMigration#head-d4ee9efe53a641e29ffdcd96e985bf38bbc671c1

creator: helder.magalhaes@gmail.com
text:
Hi Andrew,

Thanks for the links but this is a long known issue (bug 46513).

Help in testing the currently available patches and more feedback would be welcome. :-)

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 46513 ***
